bug.author: y0ast
bug.description:
I just hit a combination of: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/cornellius-gp/gpytorch/commit/5bff5be87be033f2d3a95423557b5af3dbf1746b>5bff5be</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/cornellius-gp/gpytorch/commit/903ae8bac6f35b250a0a3f58302935510d336f57>903ae8b</denchmark-link>
and it was very painful to debug. Would it be possible to make a 1.2.1 bugfix release? I am running the nightly now, so it's fixed for me, but I don't wish anyone else the same bug chase experience. :) Thanks for your work! I thoroughly enjoy GPyTorch.

comments.comment: Can do! I'm going to try to squeeze in one or two more bug fixes today - then I'll cut a release later today/early tomorrow.
